website_summaries.verdict: A commercial grade smoking gun that gives you full control over smoke intensity.
pros: Airflow is controlled by a dial, so you can fine-tune smoke intensity
Features an integrated stand and a high-quality, rugged design
Ships with extras that include samples of apple and hickory woodchips, replacement screens, and batteries
cons: Included wood chips can be difficult to light

customer_reviews.title: Well made unit with one design item I don't like.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product, feels a lot more sturdy then the last brand I bought. One design issue.. I feel this should just have the high low speed of the other model as the spinning dial does take longer to get use to. I love the metal front. Just not the way the motor runs. No leaks like my other model had. A good unit. Just wish they would have stuck with simple on the power of the motor. If I had to do over, I would have got the cheaper none commercial one do to the simplicity of its usage.
customer_reviews.author: Warriorpoet

customer_reviews.title: Works well. I live in an urban high-rise and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I live in an urban high-rise and had to give up my big green egg. I’ve been itching for a way to smoke meat and other items. I have found that it takes several applications to smoke meat adequately, but smoking cheeses and other things works very well with only one application. Obviously it is not going to provide the continuous smoke flavor that you get with a big green egg or other grill, but it works for the purpose for which it is intended therefore I gave it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: K. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Buy immediately!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Selected this model and brand after watching a YouTube demo by Chef Michael Votaggio. It is simple easy to use, gives amazing full flavor - true smoke flavor NOT an artificial cough syrup taste- HIGHLY recommend! First weekend we smoked red cayenne peppers for making hot sauce, peaches for making a salmon fish topper and Steaks, of course. All amazing
customer_reviews.author: Sally Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good smoke taste for cheese, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Don't use it indoors unless your kitchen vent really vents to the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Joe in SC

customer_reviews.title: yay i love it.
customer_reviews.text: yay i love it.... from smoking shrimp cocktail to cheese, very versatile tool. Many more uses i have planned in the future. From herbs to wood very versatile device
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, use outside!
customer_reviews.text: Intended use was for cocktails. Works well, almost too well. Easy to overpower your drinks. For smoking meat it also works great. Fill a bowel of meat with smoke, repeat. Using brined pork chops, smoked with hickory - turns out like ham. Quick, easy, adds variety and flavor to your drinks and food. Only downside is it does put out a lot of smoke, best use this outside. Only 3 stars on "Giftable" only because this isn't for everyone, but that's not a dig on the product which works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smoked Bloody Mary Anyone?
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing. Easy to use and really adds the smoke flavor.
customer_reviews.author: J. Krutsch

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it
customer_reviews.text: Used this product couple of times- did not do the job at all Do not waist your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every bit as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: We saw this product being used by Steven Raichen on his cooking show and thought it looked interesting. It is very easy to use and we've had fun smoking different foods including steak, hard boiled eggs, and we also smoked fresh garden tomatoes that we used in tomato basil bisque.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Turpitt

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have finally had the chance to use this smoker gun. I wish I could return it. Doesn't put enough smoke out to do anything. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J.

customer_reviews.title: Smoke ‘em if you got ‘em
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a lot of smoking guns and so far this one seems to be the best. The removable metal housing is heavy duty and super easy to clean. I’ve been using two for about 3 months now with a heavy workload at my restaurant with no issues beyond a battery replacement. Save your money on the Aladdin. This Polyscience will handle it.
customer_reviews.author: El_Fabuloso

customer_reviews.title: convenient, flexible way to smoke foods
customer_reviews.text: Used this to smoke steaks before sous vide. I had done sous vide steaks before without smoking and those were as good as restaurant steaks. Smoking them took the steaks to a whole new level. Excellent results without having to fire up a full size smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to make dinner unique.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t expect it to create a pit smoked flavor. It gives you a subtle smoky taste. The great thing is you can add that smoky flavor to cocktails, ice cream, cheese, popcorn, and other foods that can’t be placed in a regular fire burning smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another Useful Grilling Tool & It's Fun To Use
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and adds a mild smokey flavor to any food while using very little wood chips. I can't get over how quickly a mild smoke flavor can be added to food when using this gun. I only use it outdoors as it will set off your smoke alarms. It is also fun to use. I use a clear plastic cake cover to keep the smoke contained. Don't expect a smoke ring though.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good have been using it in the restaurant now and it's been doing this job. Time will tell to see if it can withstand the abuse and use of a regular restaurant. Plus the price on Amazon was way cheaper than JB Prince.
customer_reviews.author: hotsauce

customer_reviews.title: add that bbq flavor to your food
customer_reviews.text: use it after searing my sous vide meats. Adds a nice bbq smokey flavor. Good for smoking booze too.
customer_reviews.author: Roadking2001

customer_reviews.title: Smoke gun
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for the chef in anyone great for smoking cheese or just adding smoke flavor to your favorite meat.
customer_reviews.author: Royce T. Florence

customer_reviews.title: It actually works.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, works as expected. I had ordered another cheaper one on here and it didn't even turn on! This is way better. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you're serious about post cooking smoker. This is it!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say.. Perfect! had a cheap one previously.. No choice.. This is it
customer_reviews.author: J.W.B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so awesome, can make great smoked things in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Puts out alot of smoke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, puts out a lot of smoke very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite kitchen gadgets.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to myself for my birthday last year and I love it. It works great on just about everything I've tried. The culinary revelation of 2018 was smoked popcorn. (pop the corn with some butter or oil so the smoke sticks better. I like a combination of cherry and apple woods).
customer_reviews.author: Gylph

customer_reviews.title: The product is not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this on May 31, 2020 and used it no more than 5 times and it is already broken.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H.

customer_reviews.title: smoke your ice ream...and everything else.
customer_reviews.text: smoking ice cream was a big hit. All my friends​ couldn't have enough!
customer_reviews.author: M Belsky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the standard polyscience smoker. Buy this instead.
customer_reviews.author: Food/Drink Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this smoking gun! I now smoke everything from steak tartare to cocktails!
customer_reviews.author: ACP

customer_reviews.title: This has been a game changer with my cocktails but ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a game changer with my cocktails but it’s use certainly hasn’t been limited to that. I’ve also smoked a pound cake and fish filets. Delicious and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy J.

customer_reviews.title: Few chips big smoke
customer_reviews.text: It takes very little chips to make a lot of smoke.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Clean it thoroughly with soapy water to remove wood residue after each use.
customer_reviews.text: Made an excellent smoked Sazerac. Looking forward to using it on many other items (salmon, s'mores, maple syrup, bacon, beef ribs) this spring!
customer_reviews.author: Murmeister

customer_reviews.title: Requires constant tinkering with combustion chamber to maintain a steady smoke flow.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ‘show-off’ piece. Mediocre on the power of infusion. Best with small morsels.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel Pavlenko

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've bought in awhile.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, use it for everything. I've smoke fish to ranch dressing & tarter sauce. Smoked mac & cheese to make mac wedges and deep fried them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Weiss

customer_reviews.title: There are better devices.
customer_reviews.text: Breaks easy. Internal damage & wont run now. You have to buy extra parts to maintain & clean often.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Logan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your time with any other brand, this product is a well put together machine and stands up to commercial use no problem.
customer_reviews.author: alex sazama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. Works great and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Fun product!
customer_reviews.text: Used it and could see the color change. Had a good flavor. Easy to use, and is a great conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Haddix

customer_reviews.title: Love It! Easy to use and works like a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love It! Easy to use and works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Judy K

customer_reviews.title: For the Flashy/Extra types.
customer_reviews.text: When I'm feeling a little bit extra I pull this out and impart a delicious taste of smoke on my food items. This unit is much more attractive than the older model. I used to hide the old model in shame, forgetting it's existence in my cupboard. The new smoking gun now resides with all of my bar equipment, and I use it much more often.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Lettire

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Amazing Amazing...oh and I am an award winning Chef. I highly recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: SUPER easy to use
customer_reviews.text: SUPER easy to use ! There is very minimal to no cleaning required. You can pull this out of cupboard, add chips, light with match and you have instant smoke in about 1 minute. Tip...for extra smokey flavor...smoke foods for 3 minutes and then repeat for a second treatment. Great product. Classic Breville quality: Chrome/Steel, bullet-proof extra heavy plastic and the right amount of "over engineering". This product will last forever. Thanks Breville! Vendor who shipped it was great too. It arrived in 24 hrs !
customer_reviews.author: Rooser

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cooking Tool!! 😃
customer_reviews.text: I had seen these used on cooking shows so I thought I would get one. I love to grill on gas but what I miss is that smoke flavor I get from cooking on real wood. This device is extremely well made. It’s commercial grade in my opinion. You will need to buy the additional Breville wood chips because what they provide in the box doesn’t last long. I have used it with Salmon, pork chops and multiple cuts of beef but no chicken yet. That’s next. I use mine outside because it does put out a considerable amount of smoke. It imparts a great smoked flavor which you control the amount of smoked taste. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo the Wing King!

customer_reviews.title: This is a smoking gun for the serious cook & bartender!
customer_reviews.text: This is a serious smoking gun for the amateur bartender or home cook. It arrived securely packaged, but was easy to assemble. The gun itself is durable and stands securely on its own. It comes with two small jars of applewood & hickory chips, and we’ve already ordered more flavors of chips from Amazon. I’ve used it to smoke cocktails, and we look forward to many years of smoking food and cocktails!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Galassini

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for apartment dwelling culinary adventurists
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Smoking food before cooking on an electric stove adds a new dimension to your dishes. My only annnoyance is the fan speed dial. It’s a little unintuitive because it goes from off, to fast, to slow, I think it should be the other way around.
customer_reviews.author: Bill F.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious cocktails are to be had.
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised. I suggest you buy extra wood chips, the pro series may have a larger bowl and eat more wood than the standard.
customer_reviews.author: Snuggalorian

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fun to use. I’ve smoked everything from salt, to cheese. Even a fortune cookie. It’s a great little tool to kick up your food a notch. The trick is to get your wood lit and then cup your hand over the bowl to extinguish the flame and turn the wood to coals. That’s the smoke you use. When the wood is flaming, the smoke can have an acrid taste, which it will impart on your food. I like using wood pellets, rather than chips. You can wet the wood pellets, which will turn them to sawdust, then dry them out for use in the gun.
customer_reviews.author: MacFlagg

customer_reviews.title: Great Food, Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave my mother on of these for Christmas. I could not believe the dishes she made with this device. The plates she prepared made a steak tase like it was in an traditional smoker for a few hours, in just minutes. Must give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: John Delsanto

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Produces a lot of smoke quickly. I like that the Po version coms apart easily for cleaning and for storing in the original box. The base is very stable so it is not necessary to hold the handle when using it. Caveat: start with a small amount of smoke by using a lower setting on the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Cold smoke them all
customer_reviews.text: Cold smoke your food and drinks! This tool works well for a hint of smoke flavor. I like to apply my smoking gun to steak, fish, desserts, and cocktails.
customer_reviews.author: cshueh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use product and produces good volume of smoke. Quick way to add real smoke flavor to food that wasn’t cooked on a wood fire.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I only used it few times but it works great
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Great product, came with extra screens to help with carbon build up. Smokes well!! Must have in the kitchen if you are a foodie
customer_reviews.author: Hikerboynm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.  Very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Item works as described and better than many I have seen in high end restaurants/bars. It has a great weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Dgutz

customer_reviews.title: Smoke it if ya got it
customer_reviews.text: Works well. A bit overpriced for what it is, but live smoking our drinks and even popcorn...
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great to operate, sturdy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: easy yes but put it by counter with vent on as it smokes fast!
customer_reviews.author: DebDeb

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Makes a ton of smoke. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Rich

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. As an adventurous chef its always nice to find a new way of adding flavor to something. Very easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T Springer

customer_reviews.title: He felt like a real Chef
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift and the person was thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I am a bartender and I love this smoking gun ! It’s very easy to clean as well
customer_reviews.author: Santos Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the  cost
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these as a gift and had to buy one for myself. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smokin' Pastry Chef
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my Pastry Chef son. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lady-Who

customer_reviews.title: I was please with the "Smoking Gun". I smoked ...
customer_reviews.text: I was please with the "Smoking Gun". I smoked some St. Louis cut ribs prior to seasoning and cooking and the smoke flavor of hickory really was tasted. It produces a lot of smoke. Money well spent, next smoked jerk chicken with pimento wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work, but it hasn’t left the house. So convenient and versatile, works on everything from Popcorn, to casserole. - Recommend-
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is great if you don’t want to step outside or when it’s raining.
customer_reviews.author: ahsteve

customer_reviews.title: It looks great. I am happy I waited to buy the ...
customer_reviews.text: I give five stars for the packaging and everything is as stated. I will use this item tonight. It looks great. I am happy I waited to buy the smoking gun, because now I have the smoking gun Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Catmatt

product_meta.title: PolyScience Breville Gun Pro Smoke Infuser, Commercial, 0.5 Oz, Black
product_meta.description: Size:0.5 OzThe Breville | PolyScience Smoking Gun Pro hand-held food smoker is ideal for quickly cold smoking meat, fish, vegetables, desserts, beverages and classic cocktails in just a few minutes. Smaller and more versatile than an outdoor hot smoker, it's the perfect alternative for adding big, smoky flavor and aroma with very little effort. No soaking of wood chips or cooking food for hours for that smoky flavor. Cold smoking gently infuses a measured amount of natural wood smoke to enhance flavors without cooking or preserving foods, or changing textures or temperatures. With enhanced performance and greater longevity, the Smoking Gun Pro's 1-inch 18/8 stainless steel burn chamber loads easily and holds more smoking material than the previous model. The easy-turn dial allows total control over airflow and smoke intensity. No electricity required. It's battery-operated for portable, versatile use anywhere, both indoors or outside. Compact and lightweight with integrated stand for comfortable, single-handed operation. The 17.5-inch silicone nozzle extender hose places smoke with precision. The device works with a variety of wood smoking chips, teas and spices, hay, dried flowers, and herbs. Approved for commercial use, the cold smoker is perfect for professional and home chefs, as well as mixologists. Smoke salmon after plating, serve smoked cheese or butters, cherry tomatoes for salads, sauces, chocolate, meringues and fruit in a flash. Elevate bartender classics to modern interpretations such as smoky Negronis, Old-Fashioneds. Simply fill the burn chamber, light the combustibles, and apply the smoke to the food or beverage. Includes replacement smoke screens, wood chip sample pack (1/2-ounce each apple and Hickory flavors), 4-AA batteries, complete instructions, and 1-year manufacturer's warranty. Compact for easy storage and transport anywhere. Disassembles easily without tools. Wipe clean with a damp cloth. Detachable burn chamber and smoking barrel are dishwasher safe for easy cleanup.
feature_bullets: The smoking gun handheld Pro food smoker for adding natural smoke flavor and aroma to meat, fish, vegetables, desserts, beverages and cocktails easily
Includes smoke gun, nozzle extender hose, batteries, replacement smoke screens, Instructions, and sample wood chips (1/2-ounce each apple and hickory)
Cold smoker for professional or home chefs and mixologists; easy-turn dial customizes airflow and smoke intensity (from 5.3 to 15.1 meters per second)
Integrated stand for Comfort; 17.5-Inch extender hose for precision smoke placement; detachable burn chamber and smoking barrel are dishwasher safe
Enhanced performance, easier loading, longer longevity; battery operated for use anywhere; disassembles without tools; 1-year manufacturer's warranty; PolyScience- a Breville Brand
Included Components: Pro Food Smoker; 2 Sample Wood Chips
